title: Construction Engineer
description:
Qualifications:



Bachelor’s Degree on Engineering or Construction management

Preferably a Licensed Engineer or equivalent in a relevant discipline

At least 2+ years’ experience in Construction Management experience or equivalent

At least 5+ years proven experience in Construction/Engineering Project/Industry in Oil and Gas (O&G), Petrochemical, Petroleum, Liquified Natural Gas (LNG), and other related industry.

Experience with coordinating and supporting site Project Managers and Contract Engineering firms.

Experience in leading Field Construction Staff and Construction organization to plan & deliver work.

Good knowledge of the inter-disciplinary engineering fundamentals as applied to Terminals and Depots.

Proficient in using Planning tools software like MS Project.

Knowledge in Budget Management, Construction Estimating, MS Office – Proficient in Excel, Project Management, and Construction Site Inspection

Strong familiarity with project management software tools, methodologies, and best practices



Job Summary

The Construction Engineer of BTSMC’s project is responsible for supervising and managing various parts of construction projects to ensure they are finished on time, within budget, and with the needed quality standards. This position entails working with multiple teams, managing construction activities, and assuring compliance with standards and requirements.



Statement of Duties:

Managing the planning and decision stages of construction projects

Contributing technical expertise to project drawings and design

Performing cost calculation and preparing financial projections

Preparing work schedules in collaboration with the project manager

Liaising between contractors, subcontractors, vendors and suppliers

Overseeing construction engineering processes

Performing regular test on materials and procedures to ensure compliance with industry regulations

Ensuring that the construction project is completed on time and within budget

Documenting processes and keeping detailed construction logs

Presenting construction project progress updates to clients and senior managers

Overall assurance that implementing contractors meet client’s requirements, within his site, during project execution.

Oversees all project-related activities within his site.

Formulates and implement tactical approach based on strategy provided by lead on how to ensure Implementing Contractors are meeting client’s requirements.

Overall responsible, within his site, on implementation of company policies, procedures, and initiatives

Provides expert opinion on various site issues.

Maintains good and harmonious relationships with clients, local officials, subordinates, and colleagues.

Provides accurate and timely report to Construction Lead/Construction Manager.

Analyzes project related delays, discrepancies, and deviations then provide feedback and recommendation on how to prevent.

Reviews and ensures quality implementation of activity, schedules, and documentation under the team.

Ensures that Implementing Contractors (IC) are following client Health, Safety, Security, and Environment (HSSE) and technical requirements.

Ensures projects are implemented based on client-approved scope and schedule.

Submits various project-related reports and updates to Construction Lead/Construction Manager.

Works with IC to ensure that the project is ahead or within the schedule.

Ensures that IC provides recovery/catch-up plan if project is delayed.

Records all delays along with the cause.

Ensures that all materials (client & IC supplied) are on site prior to scheduled activity involving said materials.

Coordinates with Materials Engineer on the delivery of client-supplied materials

Ensures that the materials are inspected and approves by Quality Control (QC) before use.

Updates Bill of Materials/ Bill of Quantity (BOM/BOQ) for all projects in his/her site.

Handover all surplus material to Material Engineer

Provides scope, conceptual layout, and cost estimates.

Reviews drawings, design, project scope, methodology and other project-related documents.

Ensures that ICs are following client approved Inspection and Test Plan (ITP)

Witness inspection and testing that IC conducts.

Leads HSSE related programs implemented by client.

Inspects implementing contractor's tools and equipment.

Reviews various HSE related documents (HSE plan, Emergency Response Plan (ERP), etc.)

Recommends solutions on issues that may arise during project execution.

Reviews Method Statements and Constructability from the contractor.

Provides various project-related data and other departments

Issues Site Observation Notice (SON) and Non-Conformance Report (NCR) to implementing contractors and follow through on actions.

Provides pros and cons study on various issues related to project execution.

Collaborates with operations to align activities with desired business outcomes.

Provides various project-related data requested by Construction Lead/Construction Manager.

Leads pre-commissioning and support operation during project commissioning.

Provides lessons learned register.

Suggests process improvements that may increase efficiency or save cost.

Facilitates various meetings (e.g., weekly coordination meeting, pre-bid, kick-off).

Organizes and compiles all project documents.

Ensure handover package are submitted by Implementing Contractor.

Performs other duties that may be assigned by the Immediate Superior/ Management from time to time.

Ability to understand and anticipate customer requirements; Ability to balance the interest of the customers and company that will result on Stakeholder’s satisfaction.

Ensures that company KPIs are met.

title: Virtual Receptionist VA (Remote) | Fast Hiring – 24-Hour Review
description:
Important: Our application process moves quickly. If you are selected to proceed to the next interview stages, you must be able to respond promptly. Candidates who do not respond in a timely manner may be passed over.



We are currently seeking a Remote Spa Receptionist to manage inbound calls and book spa appointments. This is a long-term, performance-based position. Calls are recorded and reviewed regularly. Continued placement in this role depends on accuracy, professionalism, booking success, reliable attendance, no missed calls during scheduled shifts, quick response times, and the ability to professionally manage complaints and de-escalate dissatisfied clients.



To apply: Please copy the questions below, paste them into your reply, and answer each question thoroughly.



(1) Location & Utilities: Where in the Philippines are you currently located? How often have you experienced power or internet outages in the past year? Do you have backup solutions (e.g., generator, mobile hotspot) to ensure your work is not affected?



(2) Home Setup: Will you be working from home? Is your workspace quiet and suitable for handling calls? Do you have your own computer or laptop? Please attach a screenshot of your current internet speed.



(3) Availability & Speed: Can you consistently work seven days a week, six hours per day, and remain available for the full shift without missed calls? How quickly do you typically answer inbound calls? What is your current typing speed in words per minute?



(4) Call & Complaint Experience: Describe your experience with answering inbound calls, booking or scheduling appointments, customer service, following scripts, and handling complaints. Provide one real example of how you de-escalated an upset client and the outcome.



(5) Tools & Systems: What programs, tools, phone systems, or VoIP platforms have you used for handling calls? Do you have any issues with background noise, power outages, or internet interruptions? How do you take notes and log client interactions during calls?



(6) Voice Recordings: Please submit two short voice recordings. Recording one should demonstrate booking an appointment from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM with a total amount of $60. Recording two should demonstrate handling a double charge for a 90-minute massage where the client sees two $90 charges and is requesting a refund. Your tone should be calm, polite, and professional.



(7) Current Job: Do you currently have another job? If yes, where, how many hours per week, and what are your roles and tasks in that job?



(8) Schedule, Pay & Start Date: Are you able to work seven days a week, six hours per day, during Central Standard Time (CST) hours without conflicts? What is your expected hourly or monthly rate? What is your earliest physical start date if hired?



(9) Marketing, Design & Video: Do you have experience with online marketing, creating content using Canva, or producing short video clips such as
 Reels or similar platforms? Please describe your skills and provide samples of your previous work if available.



(10) Fit, Skills & Experience: Briefly introduce yourself and explain why you would be a good fit for this role. Include what you believe is most important when handling spa clients over the phone, especially during complaints, and what other skills or areas you have a lot of experience in.

title: Project Manager
description: We are looking for a signage manufacturing Project Manager with a background in estimating, design/layout, or submittal (any of the three). This requires a construction background (Civil Engineer is a plus).  Knowledge of ADA signage is preferred. With a history of working with a US-based company, the know-how of Blue Beam, or other design software knowledge is required.

title: Project Manager
description: Signage manufacturing project manager, requires construction background (Civil engineer is a plus), Knowledge of ADA signage is prefered, History of work with US based company, Blue beam and design software knowledge is required.

title: Project Manager - Construction
description:
Are you the skilled Project Manager we’re searching for in our Construction team?



We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Project Manager to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in construction, with a proven track record of success in estimating, design/layout, and submittals. This role requires excellent communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills, with a focus on delivering high-quality projects on time.



Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Architecture, or a related field.

- Minimum of 3 years of experience in construction project management.

- 1-2 years of experience working with a US-based company.

- Proven experience in estimating, design/layout, and submittals.

- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

- Knowledge of signage requirements (highly desirable).



Responsibilities:

- Manage all aspects of assigned projects, from awarding to final delivery and closeout.

- Develop and maintain project schedules and timelines.

- Coordinate with subcontractors, suppliers, and clients to ensure project progress and resolve any issues that may arise.

- Prepare and submit all necessary project documentation, including submittals, shop drawings, and change orders.

- Maintain strong client relationships and provide excellent customer service.



If you meet the qualifications and are interested, please send the link or drive of your CV along with the following requirements:

- College Diploma

- Internet Provider & Speed Test Results

- Desktop/Laptop Device Specifications

title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Expert (Architecture, Customisation & Automation)
description:
I’m looking for a genuine Microsoft Dynamics CRM expert — not someone who has simply used Dynamics as a salesperson or admin, but someone who has architected, customised, and deployed bespoke Dynamics environments to suit specific business workflows.



This is a contract role to refine and expand an existing Dynamics setup. The CRM is partially established, and I have hands-on experience with it, so I know exactly what’s possible and what’s not. I need someone who can execute properly — not someone learning on the job.

You will be responsible for designing and implementing improvements that make the CRM a true operational backbone of the business.



Scope of Work

Key objectives include:

Designing and implementing Kanban-style pipeline views for client workflow management

Customising entities, fields, forms, and workflows to suit business processes

Setting up automations for
 communication and process progression

Implementing booking and scheduling integrations and automations

Improving visibility, usability, and operational efficiency within the CRM

Advising on best-practice architecture and scalable CRM structure

Ensuring the system is clean, efficient, and built properly from a structural standpoint

This is not basic admin work. This is structural CRM design and implementation.

Requirements (Non-negotiable)



You must:

Have extensive experience configuring and customising Microsoft Dynamics CRM (Dynamics 365)

Have built or heavily customised Dynamics environments for businesses from a structural level

Be comfortable designing workflows, automation, pipelines, and business process flows

Understand how to tailor Dynamics to match specific operational requirements

Be able to provide examples of Dynamics CRM systems you have built or customised

Be able to recommend improvements and best practices — not just follow instructions blindly

Communicate clearly and professionally

If your experience is limited to using Dynamics as a sales CRM, this role is not suitable.



Contract Details

Contract role

Immediate start once scope is confirmed

Ongoing work likely for the right person

Remote work



To Apply

Please include:

A summary of your experience specifically with Microsoft Dynamics CRM setup and architecture

Examples of Dynamics CRM systems you have customised or built

Details of automations, workflows, or pipeline systems you have implemented

Your availability and hourly rate

Applications without specific Dynamics implementation experience will not be considered.

title: eCommerce Virtual Assistant
description:
We are expanding our remote team and looking for a reliable, disciplined, and ambitious eCommerce Virtual Assistant who wants long-term growth.



Our agency manages multiple eCommerce brands for international clients. This role is for someone who takes work seriously, learns fast, and wants to build a real career in digital work, not just a short-term VA job.



If you are organized, proactive, and can work independently, this is a strong opportunity.



About the Role



Start Date

Immediate



Schedule

Graveyard shift Philippine time

Monday to Friday

Weekends off



Responsibilities



You will support daily operations across multiple eCommerce brands. Tasks include:



• Managing and updating Shopify, WooCommerce, and Amazon stores

• Writing, editing, and optimizing product listings

• Conducting product, competitor, and market research

• Handling basic customer service and order processing

• Completing website updates and admin tasks

• Assisting with marketing and content-related tasks

• Creating simple graphics and visuals using Canva

• Helping with basic website layout and design improvements

• Using ChatGPT and AI tools to improve speed and accuracy

• Following systems, checklists, and instructions precisely



As you improve, you will manage client accounts more independently and take on higher-value tasks.





Requirements



• Fast learner with strong problem-solving skills

• Organized, detail-oriented, and accountable

• Able to follow instructions and meet deadlines

• Strong communication and reliability

• Proactive mindset and good work ethic

• Own laptop or desktop

• Stable, high-speed internet connection



Preferred but Not Required



• Experience with Shopify, WooCommerce, or Amazon

• Basic graphic design skills or Canva experience

• Understanding of layout, spacing, and clean design

• Familiarity with ChatGPT or other AI tools

• Previous VA, admin, or customer service experience



We prioritize attitude, discipline, and consistency over years of experience.



Compensation and Growth



• Monthly Range: 22,000 to 35,000

• Performance Bonus: ?5,000 to ?8,000 per month

• Clear path for raises, promotions, and leadership roles

• Long-term stability for consistent top performers



Why Join Us



• Stable long-term work with a structured eCommerce agency

• Clear systems, feedback, and guidance

• Learn Shopify, Amazon, and TikTok Shop operations

• Work with automation and AI tools daily

• Earn more as your skills and responsibility increase



Application Instructions



Please submit the following:



1. Resume

2. Internet speed test result

3. Laptop or PC specifications (model, processor, RAM, storage)

4. Short cover letter explaining who you are, what you’ve done, and why you are a strong fit

title: eCommerce Growth Executive
description:
Own Category Growth, Optimize Performance, and Expand Market Dominance.



Hadley Designs is seeking a Growth Executive to take full ownership of a multi-million dollar product category, with Amazon as the primary growth channel. This is a high-impact role for a results-driven e-commerce operator who thrives on ownership, accountability, and driving measurable growth through disciplined execution and data-backed decision-making.



While this role operates deeply within Amazon, we welcome candidates who have driven growth across e-commerce, DTC, or marketplace environments and are excited to apply that experience within a scaled Amazon ecosystem.



How You’ll Win at Hadley Designs:

We believe performance comes from strong systems executed consistently.



Every eCommerce Growth Executive is expected to progress through three stages:



- Learn the Playbook – Understand our category strategy, operating standards, and decision frameworks

- Apply the Playbook – Execute accurately and consistently to deliver predictable, scalable results

- Enhance the Playbook – Improve systems with new ideas and strategies after mastery is demonstrated



This order matters. We value innovation, but only when it is grounded in proven execution. Our playbook exists to help high performers win faster, create leverage, and scale impact — not slow them down.



To formally apply, apply HERE:

title: DM Outreach Setter – Immediate Start – $10/hr – Paid from Day 1
description:
Compensation



• $10 per hour equivalent

• 8-hour pay per day once 250 qualified messages are completed and logged properly

• Paid weekly via Wise or PayPal

• Performance bonuses available for consistent operators



?



Role Overview



We are hiring disciplined outreach operators to message U.S.-based junk removal and hauling businesses and book short phone calls.



This is not a creative role.

This is an execution role.



You will:

• Send 250 new DMs per day

• Use exact script (no changes)

• Log every message in Google Sheet

• Book qualified calls on our calendar

• Maintain structured reporting



Speed + Accuracy + Consistency = Long-term work.



?



Immediate Start Structure



To reduce delays, approved metro regions are pre-listed below.



You must select ONE metro that is not already assigned.



Reply with:

 1. Selected Metro

 2. “Starting now.”



You will receive confirmation and begin immediately.



No
.

No outside apps.

All communication stays on platform.



?



Approved Metro Regions (Choose ONE)



• Milwaukee, WI

• Minneapolis, MN

• Cincinnati, OH

• Pittsburgh, PA

• St. Louis, MO

• Raleigh, NC

• Louisville, KY

• Salt Lake City, UT

• Oklahoma City, OK

• Birmingham, AL

• Richmond, VA

• Hartford, CT

• Providence, RI

• Buffalo, NY

• Albuquerque, NM

• Tulsa, OK

• Omaha, NE

• Fresno, CA

• Wichita, KS

• Boise, ID



Metro assignment is first-come, first-confirmed.



?



Required Script (Use EXACTLY)



Message 1:

Hi — quick question, are you the owner of [Business Name]?



If they reply yes:



We help junk removal companies increase inbound job calls in their service area.

Would you be open to a short phone call this week to see if it makes sense?



That’s it.



• No personalization

• No links in first message

• No creative edits



?



Booking Process



When prospect agrees to a call:



Send them this booking link:







Mark status as “Booked” in sheet.



?



Tracking Format (Required)



Create Google Sheet titled:



[Metro] – Junk Removal Outreach



Columns (use exactly):

 1. Business Name

 2. City

 3. State

 4. Instagram or
 Link

 5. Date Messaged

 6. Time Messaged

 7. Status (No Reply / Replied / Interested / Not Interested / Follow Up / Booked)

 8. Notes



• No duplicates

• Screenshot proof required end of shift

• 250 NEW businesses per day (no recycled leads)



?



Daily Expectations



• 250 NEW messages minimum

• Work aligned with U.S. business hours

• Professional tone

• Fast reply handling

• Update at 125 sent



Once 250 qualified messages are completed and logged properly, that day qualifies for full 8-hour pay.



?



Who This Role Is For



• Comfortable with repetition

• Follows script exactly

• No ego

• No creative rewrites

• Can execute daily without supervision

• Serious about stable weekly income



If you are looking for:

• Interviews

• Meetings before starting

• Flexible volume

• Creative marketing



This is not the right role.



?



To Apply



Reply with:

 1. Selected Metro

 2. “Starting now.”

 3. Confirmation you can send 250 NEW messages per day



Only structured replies will be reviewed.

title: Graphic Designer / Artist – 30% Profit Share – 1M Subscriber Brand
description:
We run a long-form storytelling brand with over 1 million subscribers and a highly engaged audience.



We’re scaling our merch store at 
 and looking for a designer or artist to lead the creative side.



The traffic is real.

The audience is there.

The store is live.



Now we want to build products that scale.



Your Role



You will own the creative execution of the merch store:



• Create original merch design concepts

• Turn ideas into finished, sellable products

• Write product titles and descriptions

• Launch products on 

• Test variations

• Identify winners

• Improve and scale what converts



You are not just making graphics.



You are building revenue-generating products from idea to launch.



Why This Is Powerful



Your designs will be exposed to hundreds of thousands of viewers through an active 1M+ subscriber brand.



That means:



• Real traffic

• Real buying behavior

• Real conversion data

• Fast feedback on what resonates



Very few designers get access to this level of live audience testing without spending years building it themselves.



If you enjoy testing, refining, and scaling based on real performance data, this is a serious opportunity.



Compensation



You earn 30% of net profit above operating costs.



Thirty percent is a significant share — this is structured as a true performance partnership.



Example:



$3,000 net profit ? $900

$10,000 net profit ? $3,000



There is no cap.



If the products perform, you participate directly in the upside.



Who Thrives Here



Someone who:



• Is confident in their design ability

• Thinks commercially, not just creatively

• Is comfortable testing and iterating

• Understands that trial and error leads to winners

• Can launch, observe results, and improve without ego

• Wants ownership and real upside



To Apply



Send:



A short introduction



Your portfolio



One merch concept you would test first



Put "Ghost" in subject heading

title: Freelance Packaging Designer
description:
Freelance Packaging Designer – Primetics (Tallow x Aloe Vera Skincare)



Primetics is looking for a freelance packaging designer to design the packaging for our Tallow x Aloe Vera skincare line.



This is a project-based assignment. The brand identity and visual guidelines are already developed; the packaging must fully align with the existing brand direction.



You can explore our brand and visual identity at www.primetics.eu

 to get a clear sense of our aesthetic and design direction.



What we’re looking for



Experience in premium beauty or skincare packaging, the ability to work precisely within established brand guidelines, a strong aesthetic sense, and excellent attention to detail. The focus is on clean, refined, high-end execution.



Style Direction



Clean. Premium. Timeless. Minimalistic. Calm and aesthetic. Natural feel. Fully aligned with the existing brand identity.



Compensation



This is a freelance, project-based assignment. Compensation is $6 per hour, valid until the product and packaging are fully finalized.



If you are confident in creating beautiful, refined packaging within clear creative boundaries, please send your portfolio and a short introduction.

title: Influencer & Partnerships Coordinator (E-commerce Specialty Coffee Brand) *Part Time | Remote (Asia Time Zone)
description:
Innovative global coffee brand inventing one-of-a-kind tools redefining how coffee is experienced. We are looking for an Influencer & Partnerships Coordinator to build meaningful relationships across the coffee industry that support global campaigns and product launches.







ABOUT ICOSA BREWHOUSE:

ICOSA Brewhouse is a globally recognized specialty coffee brand reshaping coffee culture around the world. (
  / 
 )



We design one-of-a-kind tools that elevate everyday rituals and introduce new ways of enjoying coffee.



From record-breaking Kickstarter launches to collaborations with world-class coffee professionals, our products are used by champions, top cafés, and homebrewers across 100+ countries.



We are a design-led, innovation-driven brand operating in a niche we are actively shaping. We build thoughtfully, test deliberately, and care deeply about quality — in both product and execution.



As we continue to innovate, launch new products, and grow, we are looking for someone who will support in building and nurturing meaningful partnerships across the specialty coffee industry.



You will work directly with the founder and play an active role in shaping how ICOSA connects with competitors, industry leaders, and the coffee community globally.







YOUR ROLE AND OPPORTUNITY ON THE TEAM:

This is not a generic influencer outreach role.



You will be responsible for identifying, reaching out to, and developing relationships with coffee champions, competitors, industry leaders, and key opinion leaders (KOLs) within the specialty coffee community.



??You will help us:

• Identify and research relevant coffee professionals, coffee competitors, brands, and collaborators aligned with ICOSA’s Mission

 • Initiate thoughtful, personalized outreach on a daily basis in a way that fosters long-term relationships (not transactional exchanges)

 • Maintain a structured partnership pipeline and track all conversations inside our CRM system

 • Follow up proactively and ensure promising conversations are never lost

 • Coordinate collaboration discussions and next steps with clarity and organization

 • Provide weekly structured updates summarizing active conversations, progress, and upcoming opportunities

Over time, as trust and capability are demonstrated, there may be opportunities to expand scope into broader partnership coordination and system development.



What success looks like:

 • High-quality industry relationships are initiated and nurtured on a daily basis

 • Communication with KOLs is clear, thoughtful, and aligned with brand positioning

 • Regular improvements are made to the communication flow and strategy to improve engagement

 • Outreach efforts are organized and accurately tracked in a CRM

 • Promising conversations do not get lost or forgotten

 • Founders are supported daily update reports 



This role sits at the intersection of relationship-building and structured execution.



What this role is NOT:

• Not a sales quota-driven position

• Not limited to short-term campaign outreach

• Not a purely social media engagement role

• Not a transactional affiliate outreach or mass-DM automation role



This is relationship building inside a growing global brand.







ABOUT YOU / WHO WE’RE LOOKING FOR:

You are someone who:

 • Communicates clearly and confidently in written English

 • Understands how to build rapport without being pushy

 • Is socially intelligent and able to read tone and context

 • Is organized and follows through consistently using established processes

 • Can represent a premium brand professionally

 • Is comfortable working directly with founders in a small, fast-moving team



Must have skills or experience:

• 1–4 years experience in outreach, influencer marketing, partnerships, or community roles

• Strong, fluent written communication skills in English

• Is comfortable initiating conversations with high-level industry professionals

• Is naturally organized and detail-oriented

• Comfortable tracking multiple conversations and follow-ups without being reminded

• Takes pride in clear, polished communication

• Comfort working directly with founders in a small, fast-moving team

• Enjoys relationship building, but approaches it with structure

• Curious about how partnerships are built inside growing companies



Big pluses:

 • Familiarity with specialty coffee culture (ex. you know what makes Panama Geisha special)

 • Experience engaging with Instagram creators or industry experts in a niche

 • Experience building CRMs or improving existing workflows







WHY JOIN US:

At ICOSA Brewhouse, you will:

• Work directly with founders who are deeply involved in product design and global campaigns.

• Contribute to campaigns that reach a global coffee audience.

• Operate close to innovation. See products and launches before they are introduced to the world.

• Be part of a team that is pioneering global coffee culture.



ou’ll be joining a close-knit team focused on building something meaningful through collaboration.



We care deeply about growth,not just as a company, but as individuals. As we expand, there are real opportunities to take on broader ownership based on performance and initiative.



If that sounds exciting to you, you will feel at home here.







COMPENSATION AND WORKING STRUCTURE

• Hours: Begins as Part Time (10-15 hours per week), with potential to expand based on performance and ownership

• Fully remote. Asia time zone working hours required.

• You will collaborate directly with one of the founders

• Compensation range: $3.50-$6.00/hour (based on relevant experience and demonstrated capability)





HOW TO APPLY



Are you ready? 



If you’d like to join us on our journey and grow together with us, we’re looking forward to meeting you.



We understand you may have a busy schedule, so we’ve made our application process easy to follow. 



To apply, please follow the steps below:

1. Complete the quick application: 
 

2. In the first question of the application start it with: "I’m (insert your name) from (insert your city/town) and my favourite food is (insert your favourite food). Then introduce yourself and why you think you’ll be a good fit for this position. 

3. We’ll be in touch with next steps for the interview once we receive it. 



We look forward to reviewing your application.

title: Creative Strategist (DTC E-commerce) - Design & Video Background
description:
We are looking for a Creative Strategist to take full ownership of the creative direction for our brands.



We are a fast-scaling E-commerce company launching multiple brands in the Footwear & Supplements niche. We have a team of Video Editors, Graphic Designers, and Landing Page Builders ready to execute. We need YOU to provide the strategy, the research, and the winning concepts.



The Mission: You will lead the creative process from start to finish. You are responsible for researching the market, developing high-converting angles, writing the scripts, and briefing the production team.





KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:



Creative Direction: You brief our Editors and Designers. Because you have done their job before, you know exactly how to give clear, technical instructions.



Hands-On Mockups: You use your design/editing skills to quickly create wireframes or video mockups to communicate your vision to the team.



Deep Research: You analyze the market (Ad Library, TikTok) to find winning hooks and angles.



Full Funnel Strategy: You concept Ads AND Landing Pages (Advertorials/Listicles) that work together seamlessly.



Data Analysis: You have access to our Ads Manager. You analyze Hook Rates and CTRs to iterate on creatives.





REQUIREMENTS:



Technical Background: You have previous professional experience as a Video Editor or Graphic Designer. You know your way around Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, or CapCut.



DTC Experience: You have worked with 6-7 figure e-commerce brands and can prove it.



Portfolio: You must share a portfolio of creatives (Video & Static) that YOU strategized or created.



Data Driven: You don't just make things "look nice"; you make things that SELL.





TO APPLY:



Please answer the questions below. Include "STRATEGY-LEAD" in your subject line.



1. Please list the top 3 DTC brands you have worked with. For each brand, share a direct link to a creative (video or landing page) that you were responsible for. What was your specific role?



2. We value strategists who speak the language of creators. On a scale of 1-10, how proficient are you in Graphic Design and Video Editing (Premiere/CapCut)? Can you jump into a project file to fix a mistake yourself if needed?



3. Share a link to your creative portfolio?



4. If you launch a new creative and the Hook Rate is high (40%+) but the Hold Rate drops significantly after 3 seconds, what is usually the problem? How do you brief the editor to fix this specific issue?



5. If we launch a new 'Orthopedic Sneaker' for seniors, walk us through your research process. How do you find the first 3 'Angles' or 'Hooks' to test? Which tools do you use?

title: Remote Technical Support Specialist
description:
???? Job Opening: Remote Technical Support – CCTV Systems

title: Creative AI Video Editor for Meta & YT Ads
description:
Are you an editor who understands Retention, AI, and Direct Response Marketing?



We are a fast-growing e-commerce company launching multiple brands in the Footwear & Supplement niches. We are looking for a Full-Time (36h/week) Video Editor who is obsessed with AI and creating winning ads for Meta 
/Instagram) and YouTube.



This is NOT a standard editing job. We don’t just hand you footage and say "edit this." We need a Creative Partner who can source clips, generate AI visuals, and build high-converting video ads from scratch.





THE ROLE:



Create High-Retention Ads: You edit fast-paced ads (Short Form & Long Form). You understand that the hook is everything and scenes must change every 2-3 seconds to keep retention high.



AI Asset Generation: You use tools like Midjourney, Runway, or Pika to create realistic B-roll and characters when stock footage isn't enough.



Strategic Sourcing: You are an expert at finding the right B-roll from stock sites, social media (TikTok/Pinterest research), and competitor analysis.



AI Scripting & Audio: You take winning competitor angles and use AI (ChatGPT/Claude) to rewrite them into unique scripts. You then generate voiceovers using ElevenLabs.



Platform: You work primarily in CapCut for speed, effects, and auto-captions.





YOU ARE THE PERFECT FIT IF:



YOU represent the "New Wave" of editors: You don't just cut video; you use AI to create video.

YOU understand Marketing: You know the difference between a "pretty video" and a "video that sells."

YOU are a Problem Solver: Missing a clip? You don't ask us; you generate it with AI or find it online.





OFFER:

Full-Time Position: 36 hours per week

Salary: $1250 per month





HOW TO APPLY:



Read the questions below carefully. To verify you’ve read this full post, please start your application subject line with: "AI-MASTER".



1. Our goal is high retention. What is your specific technique to keep viewers watching past the first 3 seconds?



2. Which Generative AI tools (video/image) are your favorites to use right now and why? Please describe your process for creating a clip from scratch.



3. If we give you a script about "Hiking Shoes" but provide ZERO footage, how would you create the video? Walk us through your sourcing process.



4. Please send your portfolio with 2-3 examples of Ads you have created (preferably with AI elements or high-paced editing).



5. This is a full-time role (36h/week). Are you currently available for this workload?

title: Shopify Store Designer
description:
We are looking for an experienced Shopify Theme Designer who specializes in Shrine and knows how to quickly build complete, launch-ready Shopify stores from scratch.



We launch new brands and new stores regularly, and we need someone who can take our direction, copy, and assets and turn them into a fully built Shopify store using Shrine — fast. This includes theme design, product page setup, product images, logos, store copy, layout, mobile optimization, and overall presentation. Everything needed to go live.



This role is only for candidates with real Shrine experience.

If you have not designed Shopify stores using Shrine before, please do not apply.



Requirements (Mandatory):



Extensive experience using Shrine for Shopify store design

Strong portfolio of Shopify stores you've personally designed and built

Ability to take brand direction and raw assets and turn them into a complete, launch-ready store

Strong understanding of:

?- Theme customization and layout structure

?- Product page design and optimization

?- Mobile optimization

?- Tablet optimization

?- Desktop optimization

Experience working with product images, logos, and brand assets

Ability to write or refine store copy that fits the design

Attention to detail in layout, spacing, typography, and visual hierarchy

Ability to work independently, move fast, and follow creative direction



Your Responsibilities:



Build full Shopify stores using Shrine

Design and customize theme layouts, homepage and product pages

Handle product image placement, logo integration, and all visual brand elements

Write or refine product descriptions and store copy to match the brand voice

Make each store visually appealing and conversion-focused

Ensure perfect responsiveness on:

?- Mobile

?- Tablet

?- Desktop

Deliver clean, organized, and ready-to-launch stores

Implement feedback and revisions quickly when needed



Compensation & Workload:



$50–$150 per full store build (depending on scope and complexity) - We will be doing 2-3 store launches per week so that means $150-$450 weekly compensation and long-term collaboration once hired



This is not an hourly position. It is performance-based, per-store compensation.



Hiring Process:



Initial interview call

Short practical assessment to evaluate Shopify store building skills using Shrine

Final selection and onboarding



Only candidates who successfully pass all stages will be considered.



How to Apply:

We strongly prefer applications that include:



A short Loom video (around 1 minute) where you:

?- Introduce yourself

?- Explain your experience with Shrine and Shopify store design

?- Show or describe your store portfolio

?- Explain why you're a good fit for this role



And:



A portfolio or examples of Shopify stores you have built using Shrine



Applications without a portfolio will not be considered.

title: Head of Marketplaces (Ecommerce - Shopee, Tiktok, Lazada)
description:
Join our team and become part of a dynamic, global organization of 40 professionals across Korea, Singapore, Malaysia, and the Philippines. Collaborate closely with our regional teams to grow an exciting portfolio of leading Korean brands, including Beauty of Joseon, Needly, Tirtir, and other top-trending names in the market.



This role is ideal for someone with strong commercial instincts, leadership experience, and hands-on marketplace expertise. You will be responsible for driving revenue growth, managing marketplace operations, and leading strategy across multiple platforms.



Key Responsibilities:



- Defining vision, setting priorities, and driving growth across online marketplaces.

- Own overall marketplace strategy and performance (Shopee, Lazada, TikTok Shop, and future platforms)

- Drive sales growth, profitability, and market share.

- Plan and execute campaigns, promotions, and product launches.

- Optimize product listings, pricing, and assortment.

- Analyze sales data, traffic, and conversion metrics to improve performance.

- Manage marketplace operations including inventory coordination, order fulfillment, logistics, returns, and customer service.

- Monitor competitors and marketplace trends.

- Ensure compliance with marketplace policies and standards.

- Collaborate with the Marketing team to optimize demand, funnels, and conversions while scaling livestream, affiliate, and KOL/KOC commerce.

- Oversee forecasting, performance tracking, and executive-level reporting.

- Communication with Key Account Managers.

- Leading PH team, collaborating with other multicultural teams, and managing external partners.



Qualifications:

- 3 - 5 years proven experience in E-commerce Marketplace Management (e.g., Shopee, Lazada, TikTok Shop) or roles as E-commerce Manager or Marketplace Manager.

- Background in fast-growing or high-volume e-commerce businesses.

- Strong understanding of online sales, promotions, and analytics.

- Knowledge of paid ads within marketplaces (Shopee Ads, Lazada Ads, TikTok Ads).

- Proficient in Google Workspace (especially Google sheets) and Excel. Managing large datasets, utilizing advanced formulas (e.g., VLOOKUP, Pivot Tables), and generating performance reports.

- Experience managing multiple SKUs and campaigns.

- Excellent communication and leadership skills.

- Data-driven mindset with strong problem-solving abilities.



Benefits:

- Stable full time employment with leave benefits, up to 14 days annual leave, public holiday leave, birthday leave.

- Travel Opportunity to Singapore based on performance.

- Comfortable work environment, same working time zone as Philippines (GMT +8).

- Structured salary increase and promotion based on performance.



To apply, please answer a few short pre-screening questions via the Google Form linked below. This helps us better understand your background and fit for the role before the interview stage.







We appreciate your interest and look forward to hearing from you.

title: Human Resources Coordinator/ Recruitment Specialist
description:

Remote | Full-Time

A-List Virtual Solution LLC:



A-List Virtual Solution LLC is a leading home health provider in Southern California, dedicated to delivering top-tier therapy services to patients in need. We partner with some of the most prestigious hospitals and agencies, ensuring quality care while creating opportunities for clinicians to thrive.



We are looking for a highly meticulous and detail-oriented Human Resources Coordinator/ Recruitment Specialist  to join our team. google sheets: 2 years (Required)

title: Freelance SEO Specialist (Home Improvement – Singapore Market)
description:
About UncleDefect SG



UncleDefect SG is a Singapore-based home improvement and defect inspection company serving residential clients. We are expanding our digital presence and are looking for an experienced SEO Specialist with proven experience handling Singapore-based businesses, particularly within the home improvement, renovation, property, or construction sectors.



This is a long-term role for someone who understands local SEO in Singapore and can deliver measurable organic growth.

 

Key Responsibilities

• Develop and execute SEO strategies targeting the Singapore market

• Conduct keyword research specific to Singapore search trends

• Optimize website content, landing pages, and service pages

• Perform technical SEO audits and coordinate implementation

• Build high-quality backlinks relevant to the home improvement industry

• Manage Google Search Console and Google Analytics

• Optimize Google Business Profile for local SEO performance

• Monitor rankings, traffic, and conversions; provide monthly reports

• Recommend content strategies aligned with search intent

 

Requirements

• Proven SEO experience (minimum 2–3 years)

• Direct experience handling a Singapore-based company (required)

• Experience in home improvement, renovation, property, or related industries (strong advantage)

• Strong understanding of local SEO for Singapore

• Knowledge of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO

• Experience with tools such as Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, or similar

• Strong written English skills

 

Preferred Qualifications

• Basic understanding of conversion optimization

 

Compensation

• Long-term opportunity with performance-based growth

 

How to Apply

Please submit:

1. Updated resume (remove space) 

2. Portfolio or case studies of Singapore-based SEO work

3. Sample results (ranking improvements, traffic growth, etc.)

4. Expected monthly salary (in PHP)

5. Brief explanation of your SEO strategy for a Singapore home improvement company



Only applicants with Singapore market experience will be considered.

We are looking for a results-driven SEO professional ready to grow with UncleDefect SG.

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
About Us



We are a leading SaaS loyalty, marketing, and customer engagement platform serving retailers and brands across highly regulated industries in the U.S. and Canada. We help businesses strengthen customer relationships through data-driven marketing, automation, and analytics—driving retention, growth, and revenue.



About the Role



We are seeking an Account Manager / Customer Success Manager to own and grow a portfolio of mid-market and enterprise clients. This is a commercially focused role responsible for account retention, expansion, and long-term value creation, while serving as the primary point of contact for ongoing client needs.



You will manage the full post-sale lifecycle of your accounts—driving platform adoption, identifying upsell and expansion opportunities, and acting as a strategic partner to help clients achieve measurable marketing and revenue outcomes. This role is ideal for someone with SaaS account management experience who enjoys balancing relationship management with growth responsibilities in a fast-paced environment.



What You'll Do



 - Own a portfolio of approximately 100 mid-market and enterprise accounts, serving as the primary relationship owner and commercial lead.

- Drive account retention and revenue growth through renewals, upsells, cross-sells, and expanded platform usage.

- Partner with clients to optimize performance across
, SMS, and loyalty programs, aligning solutions to business objectives.

- Conduct regular business reviews focused on performance metrics, ROI, and growth opportunities.

- Identify and execute opportunities to expand client engagement through new features, products, and services.

- Lead account planning, renewal discussions, and pricing conversations in collaboration with Sales and Leadership.

- Analyze account performance data to uncover insights and recommend actionable strategies.

- Coordinate onboarding, adoption, and ongoing support by working cross-functionally with Product, Support, and Marketing teams.

- Act as a trusted advisor to client stakeholders, building long-term relationships and executive alignment.

- Advocate for client needs internally while balancing commercial goals and platform capabilities.

- Maintain accurate forecasting, account documentation, and CRM hygiene (Salesforce).



What We're Looking For



- At least 4 years of experience in Account Management, Client Services, or Customer Success within a SaaS environment (PREFERRED).

- Experience with digital marketing, messaging platforms, or loyalty products (REQUIRED).

- Proven success managing renewals, expansions, and long-term account growth.

- Strong understanding of digital marketing, marketing automation, or customer engagement platforms.

- Comfortable managing a revenue-carrying or expansion-focused book of business.

- Experienced in influencing multiple stakeholders and navigating complex client organizations.

- Data-driven, with the ability to use performance metrics to guide conversations and decisions.

- Hands-on experience with CRM systems (Salesforce preferred) and marketing platforms.

- Confident communicator with strong negotiation and relationship-management skills.

- Highly organized, proactive, and able to manage competing priorities across multiple accounts.

- Experience in e-commerce or highly regulated industries is a strong plus.



Work Setup & Compensation:



- Schedule: Follows U.S. business hours as needed.

- Location: Remote in the Philippines

- Rate: Hourly in USD



**Please include a link to your resume and short-introduction video in your message**

title: Business Development and Operations Manager
description:
Job Title: Business Development and Operations Manager (UK Property)



Salary: £4.00 per hour + Uncapped Commission

Working Hours: 07:30 – 16:30 UK TIME (Monday – Friday)

Location: Remote



About the Role: We are a leading UK Construction & Maintenance group seeking a high-level Operations Manager. This role is for a proactive professional who understands the UK Property market and can manage a business without being micromanaged. You aren't just an assistant; you are the engine room of our growth. You will handle revenue generation, lead follow-ups via GoHighLevel (GHL), and daily coordination with tradesmen and estate agents. We value ownership, we want a partner who provides solutions, not just problems.



Requirements:



Experience: Direct background in UK Lettings or Property Management is essential.

Tech: Knowledge on GHL Workflows, LinkedIn Outreach, and Project Management tools.

Communication: Must have a good American or English accent.

Primary Focus: Owning revenue generation and ensuring smooth execution of jobs and customer experience.



Responsibilities:



1. Business Development & Sales



LinkedIn outreach and lead generation (Managing Director’s profile).

Respond to inbound leads and enquiries.

Daily calls to estate agents and partners.

Follow-up on quotes, leads, and dormant clients.

Secure preferred contractor status and partnerships.

Contact councils, housing providers, care homes, and key accounts.



2. Operations & Delivery



Answer office phone and manage the main inbox.

Handle customer service and complaints.

Quote jobs accurately and manage diaries/bookings.

Allocate jobs to trades and teams.

Ensure correct job details (timing, access, materials).

Perform end-of-week customer satisfaction follow-ups.



3. CRM, Systems & Process Control



Log 100% of leads, jobs, and enquiries in GHL.

Set follow-ups, reminders, and completion checks.

Maintain pipelines and deal stages.

Work with our technical team on GHL workflows.

Identify operational blockers and propose improvements.



4. Contractor & Team Coordination (Light)



Maintain trades database and check availability.

Ensure team leaders collect photos and reviews.

Support recruitment when needed.



Commission Structure can be based on reviews, jobs won and partnerships.



How to Apply: To be considered, you MUST record a Loom video (under 5 minutes) answering these 5 questions. Applications without a video will not be reviewed.



1?. Tell me about a time you increased revenue in a property management or lettings business. What did you specifically do, and what was the measurable result?



2. If you joined us tomorrow and had to generate 5 new estate agent partnerships in 30 days, what exact steps would you take?



3. Describe a situation where a job went wrong - a contractor issue, complaint, delay, or mistake. How did you handle it?



4. How do you stay organised when managing multiple jobs, contractors, and clients at the same time?



5. If you noticed jobs were not profitable or contractors were overrunning time, what would you do without being told?

title: Ecom Performance Video Editor | High-Growth | Long-Term
description:
## Role Overview



The purpose of the Video Editor role at Ivy Ecommerce is to transform creative briefs into high-performing video ads that drive conversions at scale.



This is not just a technical editing role.



Our Video Editors are an integral part of the marketing engine. Your job is to understand the psychology, messaging, and strategy behind each ad concept, and bring it to life through sharp editing, pacing, storytelling, and attention to detail.



As a Video Editor, you are responsible for the execution and final polish of our video ads. The success of our marketing team depends on your ability to:



- Understand each creative brief from a performance/direct-response marketing lens

- Assemble visuals, hooks, captions, and pacing in a way that maximizes conversions

- Enhance the core marketing message through smart creative decisions



You understand that small details can be the difference between an ad that gets scaled to millions in spend and one that dies after testing.



Your role is to work closely with our Creative Strategists, actively learn what makes ads win or lose, and help us consistently produce winning ads month over month across our brand portfolio.





### Primary Responsibilities



- Edit and deliver ~10 ad briefs per week

- Collaborate closely with Creative Strategists to ensure each ad concept is executed correctly

- Implement feedback from the creative team and performance data to improve iterations

- Learn and internalize our ad strategy frameworks to understand what makes creatives “win” or “lose”

- Analyze your own creatives to identify what’s working, what isn’t, and how to improve

- Upload and organize final assets into the correct folders and formats for each platform





## Qualifications



### Direct Experience



- 1+ year experience editing eCommerce / performance marketing ads

- Experience working within a team environment and understanding roles in a creative workflow





### Character Traits We Look For



- Extremely high attention to detail – you care about the small things because you know they matter

- Creative + marketing-minded – you’re not just an editor, you’re curious about why ads perform

- Strong visual communicator and storyteller

- High curiosity and a desire to continuously improve your creative and marketing skills

- Willingness to do the “boring but important” work consistently at a high standard

- Clear communicator who collaborates well with a team

- Time-efficient, but willing to put in extra effort when quality demands it

- Hungry, motivated, and growth-oriented – you want to get better, take on more responsibility, and level up your career

- to make sure you are still reading, type “BLUE” in your response title.

- Coachable and open to feedback

- Not a clock-in, clock-out mindset — you care about results and impact







### This Role Is NOT for You If:



- You only want to execute tasks without understanding the marketing behind them

- You’re not interested in learning performance marketing or creative strategy

- You dislike feedback or fast-paced environments

- You’re disorganized or unreliable

- You prefer working solo and don’t enjoy team collaboration

- You’re not motivated to grow your skills and career over time







### Growth & Upside



At Ivy Ecommerce, we invest in people who perform and show initiative. This role has real upside for those who take ownership:



- Opportunity to grow into a Creative Strategist / Creative Lead role over time

- Increased responsibility across multiple brands in our portfolio

- Performance-based bonuses tied to ad spend (no cap)

- Long-term growth path into higher-level marketing and creative leadership roles



This is a long-term opportunity for someone who wants to build a career in performance marketing, creative & be part of building cool ecom brands, not just edit videos.







## ???? How to Apply



To be considered, please reply with:



- A short overview of yourself

- Your CV / Resume with your past work experience

- Your eCommerce video editing portfolio

- Your
 address + WhatsApp number



Then answer the questions below in detail:



1. What about this role excites you most?

2. Why do you believe you’re a strong fit for this role?

   

    



Applications that do not follow these instructions or provide detailed answers will not be reviewed.

title: Ecommerce Creative Lead (Graphic Designer + Video Editor)
description:
We are hiring a full-time Ecommerce Creative Lead to support an e-commerce brand that sells on Amazon and Shopify. 



This role combines graphic design, video editing, Amazon listing creatives, website creatives, and product packaging design. 



You will work directly with the founder, with support from the operations team. The founder will lead strategy and direction while your job is to execute quickly, cleanly, and accurately. As you grow in the role, you will earn more creative ownership. 



This is a long-term position for someone seeking stability and growth inside a fast-moving e-commerce company. 

 



PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES: 

- Amazon listing items (Gallery, A+ Content, Brand Story, Video) 

- Amazon A/B testing and experiments 



SUPPORT RESPONSIBILITES: 

- Update Website/Shopify creative assets  

- Short Form Content Video editing for Social Media  

- Creative Content Curation for Social Media  

- Video and Still Ad creatives for paid media 

- Product Packaging and insert cards 

- Advanced photo manipulation 

- Other Creative Work as needed 



Workload varies based on business priorities. Some weeks are heavier/lighter than others. Consistent output and meeting deadlines are essential. 

 



REQUIRED SKILLS: 

- Excellent video editing skills (Premiere, Capcut) is REQUIRED 

- Excellent design skills (Photoshop/Illustrator/Canva or similar) is REQUIRED 

- Excellent understanding of performance-driven social media creatives is REQUIRED 

- Excellent attention to detail is REQUIRED 

- Understanding brand positioning and US market fit is STRONG ADVANTAGE 



 

PREFERRED SKILLS (but not required): 

- Experience working with Amazon Seller Central is a PLUS 

- Experience with Microsoft Teams is a PLUS 

- Interest in culinary arts, cooking, kitchen industry is a PLUS 

- Interest in music recording, sound recording is a PLUS 

- Interest in American pop-culture is a PLUS 

 

 

WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE: 

- Delivering creative assets consistently on time 

- Fast and accurate revision cycles 

- Clean, professional design aligned with brand guidelines 

- Creative that improves click-through rate and conversion 

- Ability to handle multiple asset types without confusion 



 



PERKS: 

- Flexible hours with clear deadlines and deliverables

- Paid time off with advance notice

- Performance-based raises and bonuses tied to clear goals and metrics

- Long-term growth opportunity within the company

- Philippine regular and special non-working holidays observed

 



ABOUT THE COMPANY & ME: 

Since 2017, we have operated multiple e-commerce brands, selling across Amazon, Shopify, Etsy, and eBay in North America. This role will focus primarily on our core brand, with room to expand into additional brands over time.



We operate with a performance mindset. We move quickly, test consistently, and evaluate creative work based on measurable results.



Our team is small and focused. We prioritize accountability and long-term collaboration. We are seeking the RIGHT FIT - someone who is proactive, accountable, and motivated to grow with the company over the long term.

 



TO APPLY FOR THE JOB / APPLICATION PROCESS: 



1) Change the subject line to: “Ecommerce Creative Lead - [Your Name]” 



2) Write 2-3 few sentences on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. 



3) Below that, include the following:

      A) Link to your portfolio/website/resume 

      B) Links to active current websites, social pages, ads you've designed



4) We will review all applications and shortlisted applicants will receive a 1-hour test task to evaluate skills and attention to detail.

 

5) Candidates who successfully complete the test task will be invited to a final interview.

 



**NOTE: We have a rolling application for this position. There is no "due date" for the task but most applicants finish the task within 48 hours.

title: Video Editor
description:
As a Video Editor, you will play a crucial role in transforming raw footage into captivating visual stories that engage and inspire audiences. Your creativity and technical expertise will shine as you collaborate with our content creation team to produce high-quality videos that align with our brand vision. This is your chance to bring your artistic flair to life while working in a dynamic and supportive environment!



What you’ll do:

-Edit and assemble recorded footage into polished video content that meets project specifications and deadlines.

-Collaborate with directors, producers, and other team members to understand project goals and vision.

-Utilize industry-standard software such as Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, and Adobe After Effects to enhance video quality through post-production techniques.

-Incorporate motion graphics, typography, and visual effects to elevate storytelling and viewer engagement.

-Conduct photo editing and manipulation using tools like Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom to complement video content.

-Manage video assets efficiently using content management systems (CMS) and FTP protocols for seamless file transfers.

-Stay updated on the latest trends in videography, graphic design, and animation techniques to continuously improve your craft.



Basic qualifications:

-Proficiency in video editing software including Adobe Creative Suite (Premiere, After Effects, InDesign), Final Cut Pro, Avid, and Cinema 4D.

-Strong understanding of post-production processes including color correction, audio mixing, and video compression.

-Experience with photography and videography principles to enhance visual storytelling.



Preferred qualifications:

Knowledge of graphic design principles with skills in Adobe Illustrator for creating engaging visuals.

Experience in filming techniques that contribute to high-quality video production.



Why you’ll love it here:

We’re dedicated to fostering a creative environment where your talents can flourish! Our team values innovation and collaboration, allowing you to express your ideas freely while contributing to exciting projects.



Our benefits include:

-Opportunities for professional growth and skill development.

-A vibrant workplace culture that encourages creativity and teamwork.

-Supportive resources for your well-being both personally and professionally. Join us in crafting compelling narratives through the art of video editing! Your journey starts here—let’s create something extraordinary together!



Job Type: Full-time



Work Location: Remote

title: Experienced Full Cycle Accountant
description:
Accountant / Bookkeeper for Comprehensive Financial Support



Job Overview:

We are seeking a detail-oriented and reliable Accountant / Bookkeeper to provide comprehensive support across various financial domains in our company. This remote, freelance position requires expertise in handling Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable and reconciliation.



The ideal candidate will be proactive, efficient, and committed to timely and accurate financial reporting and management.



Responsibilities:



- Accounts Payable (AP): Assist with invoice processing, ensure timely payments, and work on maximizing cash flow efficiencies. Manage vendor relationships and handle any disputes or issues to maintain positive engagements.



- Accounts Receivable (AR): Support the billing and collections processes to ensure they are optimized for faster cash cycles. Handle customer queries and ensure clear and transparent communication to strengthen customer relations.



- Record to Report (R2R): Help maintain accurate records of all financial transactions and ensure compliance with accounting standards and legal requirements. Support the generation of reports that offer insights into the financial health of the business.



- Payroll Management: Assist in processing payroll accurately and on time, adhering to all tax regulations and internal policies.



Required Skills and Qualifications:

- Associate or Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.

- Proven bookkeeping experience, with a strong understanding of accounting principles and practices.

- Proficiency in accounting software such as QuickBooks, Xero, or similar.

- Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively.

- Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.

- Effective communication skills, capable of handling interactions with tea
mbers and external partners.



Additional Information:

- This is a remote position with flexible hours, ideal for freelancers.

- Start your application with the word: CoFE in the header to ensure you read the entire description

- Immediate availability is preferred.

- Candidates should include a detailed resume and a brief cover letter outlining relevant experience and qualifications.

title: Senior Creative Strategist (Supplements / DTC)
description:
Senior Creative Strategist (Supplements / DTC)



We’re hiring a senior-level Creative Strategist to own and lead creative strategy across six supplement brands. This is a performance-first role, not a script factory. You’ll be responsible for developing angles that convert, guiding execution, and driving measurable revenue through paid media.



If you’ve scaled real brands, worked closely with media buyers, and know how to turn insights into winning creatives—this role is for you.



What You’ll Do



Own end-to-end creative strategy across multiple supplement brands



Develop weekly creative angles, concepts, and structured briefs



Write strategy-led UGC and ad scripts designed for performance



Analyze ad performance, identify winning creatives, and iterate quickly



Collaborate daily with editors, creators, and media buyers to execute campaigns



Build and refine creative systems that consistently produce scalable winners



Lead and guide creative execution across a growing team



Requirements



Proven experience working with supplement or DTC brands



Managed or contributed to $100K+ ad spend on Meta



Created 200+ performance-focused ad scripts



Demonstrated success in scaling brands and identifying winning angles



Experience leading or directing a creative team



Strong analytical mindset with the ability to read performance data



Fluent English required (German is a plus)



Comfortable working in a remote environment with Hubstaff time tracking



Tools & Workflow



Meta Ads Manager



Creative performance dashboards



Collaboration with media buyers and editors



Hubstaff required for time tracking and accountability



Do Not Apply If



You only generate AI-written scripts with no real performance insight



You lack hands-on experience scaling paid ads for real brands



You’ve never worked directly with media buyers or performance data



How to Apply



Please include:



Brands you’ve worked with (supplements or DTC preferred)



Your role and day-to-day responsibilities



Measurable results (ROAS, CPA improvements, scaling milestones, etc.)



Examples of creative briefs, angles, or ad concepts you’ve developed



Or contact our assistant directly on WhatsApp:

title: Cyber Security Expert
description: Looking for a proficient cybersecurity and Microsoft Teams Specialist. Good Salary and Bonuses. Great Team to work with. If interested please submit resume.
